content:
You and your friends Rachel and Mike were smart to arrive early and take advantage of the early access period. The Terror Tram and House of Horrors are both popular attractions, and getting to them before the crowds arrived was a great strategy.

The Terror Tram, in particular, is a great way to start the night. It sets the tone for the rest of the event and provides a unique experience that's different from the traditional mazes. And, of course, the House of Horrors is a classic HHN attraction that's always a fan favorite.

By getting a head start on these attractions, you and your friends were able to avoid the long lines that typically form later in the night. That must have been a huge relief and allowed you to enjoy the rest of the event without feeling too rushed or overwhelmed.

Did you and your friends have a favorite part of the night or a favorite scareactor encounter?
